mapper.select: SELECT CHATROOM_NO, CHATROOM_CREATE_DATE, BUYER, SELLER FROM CHATROOM WHERE BUYER = #{buyer} AND SELLER = #{seller}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATROOM ( CHATROOM_NO, CHATROOM_CREATE_DATE, BUYER, SELLER ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHATROOM_NO.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{buyer}, #{seller} )
INSERT INTO MESSAGE ( MSG_NO, MSG_CONTENT, SEND_DATE, READ_YN, RECEIVER, SENDER, CHATROOM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MSG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{msgContent}, SYSDATE, #{readYn}, #{receiver}, #{sender}, #{chatroomNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT MSG_NO, MSG_CONTENT, SEND_DATE, READ_YN, RECEIVER, SENDER, CHATROOM_NO FROM MESSAGE WHERE CHATROOM_NO = #{chatroomNo} ORDER BY SEND_DATE ASC

SELECT cr.CHATROOM_NO, cr.CHATROOM_CREATE_DATE, cr.BUYER, cr.SELLER, CASE WHEN cr.BUYER = #{userNo} THEN cr.SELLER ELSE cr.BUYER END AS OTHER_USER_NO, u.NICKNAME AS OTHER_USER_NAME, u.MODIFY_PROFILE AS OTHER_USER_AVATAR, lm.MSG_CONTENT AS LAST_MESSAGE, lm.SEND_DATE AS LAST_MESSAGE_DATE, NVL(uc.UNREAD_COUNT, 0) AS UNREAD_COUNT, lm.SEND_DATE AS SORT_DATE FROM CHATROOM cr LEFT JOIN TB_USER u ON u.USER_NO = CASE WHEN cr.BUYER = #{userNo} THEN cr.SELLER ELSE cr.BUYER END LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.CHATROOM_NO, m.MSG_CONTENT, m.SEND_DATE FROM MESSAGE m INNER JOIN ( SELECT CHATROOM_NO, MAX(SEND_DATE) AS MAX_DATE FROM MESSAGE GROUP BY CHATROOM_NO ) latest ON m.CHATROOM_NO = latest.CHATROOM_NO AND m.SEND_DATE = latest.MAX_DATE ) lm ON lm.CHATROOM_NO = cr.CHATROOM_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CHATROOM_NO, COUNT(*) AS UNREAD_COUNT FROM MESSAGE WHERE RECEIVER = #{userNo} AND READ_YN = 'N' GROUP BY CHATROOM_NO ) uc ON uc.CHATROOM_NO = cr.CHATROOM_NO WHERE cr.BUYER = #{userNo} OR cr.SELLER = #{userNo} ORDER BY NVL(lm.SEND_DATE, cr.CHATROOM_CREATE_DATE) DESC
